HEADER.Title: check return code of command Generic

SCRIPT.MSCRI: : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_APACHE_HTTPSERVER.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@WINDOWS : CASE "UNIX" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_APACHE_HTTPSERVER.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@UNIX : OTHER : ENDSWITCH

DOCU_Docu.DOC: This include verifies the return code of the executed command in both windows and unix.
